name: NMPInsightsPodcast
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Listen to insights on the business, products, and user experience found at the intersection of media and technology. Your host, Gerard Kunkel, is a lifelong executive in technology, media, and product design. He has led, advised and contributed to the success of startups as well as Fortune 50 media and technology businesses for the past 30 years - including Comcast, Microsoft, CBS, WorldGate, GuideWorks, Univision and Samsung. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
